00050 /* ----- Radio Family 1 ----- */
00051 #if (defined MRFI_RADIO_FAMILY1)
00052 #include "radios/family1/mrfi_radio.c"
00053 #include "radios/family1/mrfi_spi.c"
00054 #include "radios/common/mrfi_f1f2.c"
00055 #include "bsp_external/mrfi_board.c"
00056 
00057 /* ----- Radio Family 2 ----- */
00058 #elif (defined MRFI_RADIO_FAMILY2)
00059 #include "radios/family2/mrfi_radio.c"
00060 #include "radios/common/mrfi_f1f2.c"
00061 
00062 /* ----- Radio Family 3 ----- */
00063 #elif (defined MRFI_RADIO_FAMILY3)
00064 #include "bsp_external/mrfi_board.c"
00065 #include "radios/family3/mrfi_spi.c"
00066 #include "radios/family3/mrfi_radio.c"
00067 
00068 /* ----- Radio Family 4 ----- */
00069 #elif (defined MRFI_RADIO_FAMILY4)
00070 #include "radios/family4/mrfi_radio.c"
00071 
00072 /* ----- Radio Family 5 ----- */
00073 #elif (defined MRFI_RADIO_FAMILY5)
00074 #include "radios/family5/mrfi_radio.c"
00075 #include "radios/family5/mrfi_radio_interface.c"
00076 
00077 /* ----- Radio Family 6 ----- */
00078 #elif (defined MRFI_RADIO_FAMILY6)
00079 #include "radios/family6/mrfi_radio.c"
00080 
00081 #else
00082 #error "ERROR: Radio family is not defined."
00083 #endif
